[@microsoft/fast-element](../fast-element/index.html) &gt; [ContentView](../fast-element.contentview/index.html)

## ContentView interface

A simple View that can be interpolated into HTML content.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ContentView 
```

## Methods

<table><thead><tr><th>

Method


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[bind(source, context)](../fast-element.contentview.bind/)


</td><td>

Binds a view's behaviors to its binding source.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[insertBefore(node)](../fast-element.contentview.insertbefore/)


</td><td>

Inserts the view's DOM nodes before the referenced node.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[remove()](../fast-element.contentview.remove/)


</td><td>

Removes the view's DOM nodes. The nodes are not disposed and the view can later be re-inserted.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[unbind()](../fast-element.contentview.unbind/)


</td><td>

Unbinds a view's behaviors from its binding source and context.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
